an10.111:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
an10.111:2.3: “Idha, bhikkhu, bhikkhu asekhaya sammaditthiya samannagato hoti, asekhena sammasankappena samannagato hoti, asekhaya sammavacaya samannagato hoti, asekhena sammakammantena samannagato hoti, asekhena sammaajivena samannagato hoti, asekhena sammavayamena samannagato hoti, asekhaya sammasatiya samannagato hoti, asekhena sammasamadhina samannagato hoti, asekhena sammananena samannagato hoti, asekhaya sammavimuttiya samannagato hoti.
an10.111:2.4: Evam kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu asekho hoti”ti.
